sentences.sContent: ‘You go back to bed now,’ he said gently.
sentences.sCn: “你回去睡觉吧。”他温柔地说道。

sentences.sContent: She kissed me gently on the cheek.
sentences.sCn: 她温柔地亲吻我的脸颊。

sentences.sContent: Gently cook the peppers for 10-15 minutes.
sentences.sCn: 用文火将辣椒煮10到15分钟。

sentences.sContent: Rain pattered gently on the roof above.
sentences.sCn: 雨点轻轻拍打着上面的屋顶。

words.tran: 温顺；亲切；高贵；彬彬有礼
